Text: Thnx a bunch!!! Detroit's awesome music and the strangely friendly people will always make it a very special place for me. This doc. looks to be just about those things, can't wait to see this one!

I just finished streaming this documentary and I'm glad to see it's here on tpb. 

It is DEFINITELY worth seeing!

Thanks for uploading, I want to show it to my friends.
I recently watched this on tv, what an awesome, interesting doco! Made me nostalgic for an era that I was never a part of.

I am only so sorry I just now read about and discovered this film.... Now, on year later, there is only 4 seeders...

Now, if those of you who can and read this messages, could you PLZ start to seed again....?
